attributes.action: Bring in Jaywalking Laws into the UK
attributes.additional_details:
So many accidents in the UK are caused by people running and walking across roads without due care and attention.
How many times have people seen elderly persons seemingly walk across a road without looking.
How many times have we seen children play "chicken"with cars,or simply just run across a busy road without looking.

How many times do we see people walking out on a dark winters night, wearing dark clothing.which cannot be seen by drivers at night.

This has to Stop,. pedestrians should have Culpability for their actions.
Stop blaming Drivers for every accident.
